t: r/Scams on Reddit: My hairdresser told me to be careful ordering hair products from Amazon because many second hand sellers buy the product in bulk, throw it in vats and put a bunch of other stuff in it to save money with each batch…and basically what you think you’re putting in your hair is not what’s on the label
